subject: Can we have multiple runs for a single  test method of the Unit test case
msgSnippet: Hi all, Pls look into my query. I have a testMethod  testXYZ() in a Test class.. And I do the following testing in that method boolean isSuccessful=true;
messageBody:
Hi all,

Pls look into my query.

I have a testMethod testXYZ() in a Test class..

And I do the following testing in that method
boolean isSuccessful=true;
public void testMethod(){

for (int i =0;i<5;i++){
assertEquals(isSuccessful, true);
}
}
Here, I will have a single run for the for loop..

Is it possible to have 5 different runs for the above without using
separate test methods..

thanx in advance
Mohan
